TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextComposition extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示文字輸入的相關撰寫，其中包含撰寫文字本身、任何相關的控制項或系統文字，以及撰寫的完成狀態。

span.span: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體，新的執行個體都會有設**上**。If this constructor is used to create a new instance of , the new instance will have set to **On**.

span.span: Completes this text composition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫靜態方法與這個文字撰寫，做為輸入參數。This method calls the static method with this text composition as the input parameter.
